snippet.title: Xbox One "YOMIWOSAKUHANA" Japanese Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the official Teaser Trailer for our upcoming Xbox One title "YOMIWOSAKUHANA" which was first shown at our 10th Anniversary Event held in Akihabara, Tokyo on May 1st.

This promotional video portrays a unique world of characters dressed in kimonos, a town filled with the dead, and flowers blooming in the field of battle.

The game is planned for a Spring 2017 release in Japan.

While we still have no news in regards to the localization of this title, feel free to follow our Twitter account to keep updated with the latest news and announcements!

https://twitter.com/PR_Experience

For those looking for something to play in the mean time check out "Stranger of Sword City", our Dungeon RPG which is currently available on the Xbox One.

We have an 8-hour Free Play Trail version available that allows players to carry over saved data made during the trail to the Full Game.

https://store.xbox.com/en-US/Xbox-One/Games/Stranger-of-Sword-City/d20c4965-2b40-4187-80df-422d28fc0906
